prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Harold Beebe Farm (venue_uid=hvt-venue)","Location":"city: Manchester city_uid=manchester, state:VT state_uid=vt.","GEO context":"lat=43.2530525, lon=-73.00842279999999 placeid=EiQyOTcxIFVTLTcgIzJjLCBEb3JzZXQsIFZUIDA1MjUzLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCUc6KDKWXOCJEaZmeWcpsOolEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-vermont/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-vermont/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hvt-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Vermont — Venue Profile (Manchester, VT)",
  "section_overview": "Classic New England summer showing with efficient ring flow and mountain-weather mood swings. Multiple rings run in parallel, so plan by ring cluster and live off in-gate texts. Warm-up rings are orderly but surge before eq and derby cards—catch a quiet window right after a drag for the truest read. The jog strip is clearly posted near the hunter complex: numbers front and center, quick forward trot, and a microfiber towel in your pocket. Vendor row carries week-save essentials (gloves, spur straps, studs, braiding fixes) and quick snacks between trips. Stabling is laid out for straight shots to schooling areas—keep fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags pre-packed for fast turnarounds. Footing is modern all-weather with frequent drags and water; it rides best once it’s packed, so pop a vertical early to set your canter. Expect cool mornings, pop-up showers, and bright sun an hour later—layers and spare gloves live in the ring bag for a reason.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Vermont",
    "Manchester VT horse show",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "ring flow",
    "all-weather footing"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your HITS Vermont week like a pro",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-vermont/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings and warm-up area at HITS Vermont in Manchester, Vermont",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-vermont/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Vermont (Manchester, VT): warm-up timing, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring strategy for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Vermont — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing—so you stay efficient all week in Manchester.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Vermont Venue Profile — Manchester, VT",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Vermont: warm-up strategy, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Vermont",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up cadence: light right after a drag—build your last oxer then for the best read.",
      "Ring clusters: group classes by in-gate to cut cart miles and missed calls.",
      "Jog strip kit: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spritz; numbers visible and a forward trot.",
      "Footing feel: improves as it packs—set canter with a simple vertical early.",
      "Call-ups: monitor in-gate texts and stage two trips out with a spare crop and holes punched.",
      "Stabling ops: fans secured, trunks flush, ring bag stocked (studs, extra gloves, towel).",
      "Weather swing: layers in the bag; expect cool AMs, sun, and surprise showers.",
      "Derby/GP days: earlier schooling wins—warm-ups fill quickly before big cards.",
      "Vendor row timing: hit it between drags, not at last call, for zero-stress fixes.",
      "Team roles: one tack runner, one ring runner; radios save steps and scratches."
    ]
  }
}

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.

venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
